title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.50 - WALK ON LEFT FACING TRAFFIC and No Hitchhiking Signs (R9-1, R9-4, R9-4a)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.50 - WALK ON LEFT FACING TRAFFIC and No Hitchhiking Signs (R9-1, R9-4, R9-4a)

State Regulations
DELETE the entire section. INSERT the following paragraphs: Standard: 00A The R9-1 and R9-4a signs shall not be used in New

York. Option: 00B The WALK ON LEFT FACING TRAFFIC (NYR9-3) sign (see

Section
2B.107
) may be used on highways
where no sidewalks are provided. Option: 00C The No Hitchhiking (R9-4) sign (see Figure 2B-26) may
be used to prohibit standing in or adjacent to the roadway for the purpose of
soliciting a ride. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2B.50

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
